Issue.creator: caod
Issue.description: Via discussion with ~jyellick , the doOutputAnchorPeersUpdate| https://github.com/hyperledger/fabric/blob/master/cmd/configtxgen/main.go#L77 was likely a bad idea and has to have a lot of messy logic in it to accommodate for channel config updates. We should do things right and just use the configtx.yaml and go ahead and remove this function.
